Thanks everything worked great, i definitely recommend JBridge, get the DL through Piratebay, works without a hitch, run Jbridge, select the 64bit option, make sure u go into your 64bit plugin folder, and make a new folder called bridge, (do this before hand) then Jbridge will ask you to select your 32bit vst folder, select it, and then it will ask you to select the new folder, go and select that bridge folder you made, then when your done....go into that bridge folder and just cut and paste everything into the 64bit folder.....hope thats not confusing! and if youve used ableton before you know how to scan for new VST's your done!!
WORKS PERFECTLY. Thank you Ching_Liu and R2R for this awesome torrent!

To those having problems with missing files and failed installation, do the following:

1. After torrent finishes downloading, RENAME the torrent folder from 

"Ableton Live 9 Suite 9.0.1 (64 bit-R2R) [ChingLiu] " 

to something short like "setup".
Does this work 100 procent ? is it full version or is it just a trial version ? do you get the whole sound library when you download it ? please answer me dear firends!

If you are unable to install because of a failure locating the detuned drum or such error message, do this:
1. Delete the Ableton 9 setup64 folder you made from the extraction of the winrar folder (DO NOT DELETE THE ORIGINAL RAR FOLDER!).
2. Double click the Ableton 9 setup64.rar folder
3. The new window opens, drag the Setup folder to you desktop and run the Setup from inside it.
4. (It will probably tell you in the installer that you need to rename the start menu path. Just add a number 2 or whatever after Suite.)
5. Enjoy
